name: Sarah Johnson
bio: Sarah brings over 15 years of experience in enterprise technology leadership, having previously served as CTO at Fortune 500 companies. She holds a Master's in Computer Science from MIT.

name: Michael Chen
bio: Michael is a seasoned technology executive with expertise in cloud architecture and digital transformation. He has led successful implementations across healthcare, finance, and manufacturing sectors.

name: Emily Rodriguez
bio: Emily specializes in operational excellence and client relationship management. With a background in management consulting, she ensures our solutions deliver measurable business impact.

name: David Kim
bio: David leads product strategy and innovation, focusing on creating solutions that address real-world enterprise challenges. He has a PhD in Information Systems and extensive experience in product development.
